body:
Prefer dropping in a grpc-message into the generated error to expanding
grpc_error_get_status: error generation is on the slow path, turning an
error into a status is on the fast path.

On Mon, Mar 6, 2017, 2:52 PM Yang Gao <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Currently the user only see "OS Error" while we have error details about
> the call and error details. This might require some change in
> grpc_error_get_status.
>
